channel.title: Requesting Secure Rscd Forums And Reg
channel.description: I have the rscd forums dayle posted but guests can make anyone admin delete topics, posts, acess DB, i tried to change permissions and default user groups, but nothing worked. If anyone could post secure rscd forums where guests cant make anyone admins and stuff that would be great, thanks.

item.title: Requesting Secure Rscd Forums And Reg
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“BuyMyJunk, post:5, topic:225032”][quote author=dumm1s link=topic=295796.msg2379501#msg2379501 date=1218501504]
its nothing insecure about “rscd forum” its a punbb forum,
just remove the 123.txt apperantly.
and change users privlges for user 1 as rank 5 or w/e you choose.

and guest can’t do that,
and for the database, make a password.
[/quote]
deleting it wont stop it it will just create another, you need to look in every file included and looked for “123.txt”, and take that section out that creates it
off the top of my head the only thing i remember that has 123.txt in it is the status.php
something else might have you just have to look[/quote]You’re right. Its only in status.php.

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting Secure Rscd Forums And Reg
